Summary: a nice concept but a bit awkward
text: i bought this thinking that it was a really good idea to keep the pup busy, but upon introducing it to my boston terrier, he was a bit hesitant about approaching the toy.  i think it's the spikey round opening of the container.  plus, he's not a "puller" so he hasn't quite figured out how to get the treats out.  it's been more frustrating than fun for him thus far.  all in all, a nice idea but not an intuitive toy for dogs.
